name: strivetrack-2.1
description: StriveTrack 2.1 - Pure Cloudflare Architecture with Parcel

scripts.build:production: npm run clean && PARCEL_BUILD_ENV=production NODE_ENV=production npx parcel build src/index.html --public-url ./ --no-source-maps && cp src/_headers dist/_headers && cp src/_redirects dist/_redirects
scripts.deploy:quick: npm run build:production && npx wrangler pages deploy dist
scripts.deploy:full: node preflight-check.js && node deploy.js && node deploy-worker.js
scripts.deploy:domain: echo 'Setting up strivetrackapp.com...' && npm run deploy:full
